mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT(COMMENT, user_id, movie_id) VALUES(#{comment}, #{user_id}, #{movie_id})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COMMENT WHERE MOVIE_ID=#{movie_id} AND USER_ID=#{user_id}

SELECT b.profile_img, a.nickname, c.comment, c.write_time, c.modify_time, c.views, c.like_cnt, c.comment_cnt, c.user_id, c.movie_id FROM user a JOIN user_detail b ON a.id = b.user_id JOIN comment c ON c.user_id = a.id where movie_id = #{movie_id} order by c.like_cnt desc;
